mapper.insert: insert into grade(codeshare, charge, monitor, class_name, commissary, create_time) values(#{vo.codeshare}, #{vo.charge}, #{vo.monitor}, #{vo.className}, #{vo.commissary}, NOW())
mapper.select: select g.id, g.codeshare, g.charge, g.monitor, g.class_name AS className, g.commissary,g.monitor, g.create_time AS createTime from grade g where codeshare=#{classNumber} and status=0
select codeshare from grade where status =0;
select g.codeshare, g.class_name AS className, g.create_time AS createTime from grade g order by g.create_time DESC
